history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: is_lim_Rabs_0,is_lim_inv.

exceptions.exn: In environment P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "Rbar_locally (Rbar_inv 0) P" with "Rbar_locally 1 P".

In environment H : forall (f : R -> R) (x l : Rbar), is_lim f x l -> (l = 0 -> False) -> is_lim (fun y : R => / f y) x (Rbar_inv l) P : R -> Prop Unable to unify "match Rbar_inv ?M2553 with | Finite a => locally a P | p_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, M < x -> P x | m_infty => exists M : R, forall x : R, x < M -> P x end" with "exists eps : posreal, forall y : R_UniformSpace, ball 1 eps y -> P y".

exceptions.tactic: apply is_lim_Rabs_0 in H; [| apply H0].
apply filterlim_inv in H; [apply H | auto].
exceptions.exn: The reference filterlim_inv was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. apply is_lim_inv with (l := 0). - apply H. - intros H0. apply is_lim_Rabs_0 in H; [| apply H0]. apply filterlim_inv in H; [apply H | auto].
